-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Please see the README on GitLab at
--   <a>https://github.com/frankhjung/haskell-multiply#readme</a>
@package multiply
@version 0.2.0


-- | Haskell implementations of multiplication algorithms as described by
--   <a>From Mathematics to Generic Programming</a>.
module Multiply

-- | The <a>Egyptian multiplication</a> as described by Ahmes.
multiply0 :: Word -> Word -> Word

-- | Improved Ahmes algorithm.
multiply1 :: Word -> Word -> Word

-- | Improved Ahmes algorithm using an accumulator.
multiply2 :: Word -> Word -> Word

-- | Non-recursive version of Egyptian multiplication. Based on
--   <a>MathnStuff Egyptian multiplication</a>.
multiply3 :: Word -> Word -> Word

-- | Non-recursive version of Egyptian multiplication by <a>Rodrigo Girão
--   Serrão</a>
multiply4 :: Word -> Word -> Word

-- | Double the current value.
double :: Word -> Word

-- | Continuously double value.
doubles :: Word -> [Word]

-- | Half the current value.
half :: Word -> Word

-- | List of halves until 1.
halves :: Word -> [Word]

-- | Repeatadly half the given integer until 1 then replace even entries
--   with 0 and odd entries with 1.
oddHalvesBinary :: Word -> [Word]
